headline: Should Investors Revisit Stanley Black & Decker After Its 5% Weekly Jump in 2025?
summary: Thinking about Stanley Black & Decker's stock right now? You are not alone. With shares closing recently at $67.85, it is understandable if you are weighing whether now is the moment to buy, hold, or move on. The past year has tested investors' conviction, as the stock has fallen 33.4% over the last 12 months and is still down 15.1% so far this year. Even the five-year change is striking at -55.4%. If you zoom into the last week, you will notice a bounce of 5.3%. This shows that sentiment can...
